title: AQUA2 Kinodynamic Controller
summary: Simulator + hybrid controller for flipper-actuated AUV; PINN fit for nonlinear hydrodynamics to improve fidelity and control response.

title: DRON UAV Swarm
summary: Sub-$2k disaster-response swarm using PX4, Raspberry Pi, OpenCV GCS for depth/thermal mapping in Unity; led 16-member team.

title: Wire Perching Autonomy
summary: Perception-based offboard navigation with ROS2/PX4 to perch UAVs on wires; 90% success in HITL/SITL and field tests.

title: PHOENIX Mars Rover PDR
summary: Managed 22-person NASA L'SPACE team to PDR for subsurface ice detection rover; authored 500+ pages on TRL, risk, and architecture.

title: Thrust-Vector Lander
summary: Gimbaled thrust-vectoring concept for SEC Ignite; 1-DOF MPC, CFD/FEA trades, perfect technical score and 3rd place finish.

title: Pegboard Fire Extinguisher
summary: Designed a pegboard mount for the TURTLE Robotics Fire Extinguisher

title: Turtle Nametag Machine
summary: Made a custom OpenScad workflow to mass produce custom nametags without Solidworks

title: Pegboard Vaccum Holder
summary: Fitting holders to a commercial handheld vaccum cleaner.

title: Jumping Jack
summary: Robotic pneumatic piston assembly for eight 1000-hour trampoline lifecycle tests with custom fixtures and reporting.

title: RF Antenna Clip
summary: Designed and prototyped Fusion 360 antenna clip for fox-hunt; soldered 250+ RF PCBs and validated signal integrity.

title: Rover EDL Optimization
summary: Mars rover EDL optimization across 9 parameters with 5 constraints; placed 4th of 28 teams in timed race on randomized terrain (MEEN 357).

title: Bungee Jumper Modeling
summary: Dynamics & vibrations simulation of bungee jumper with variable cord stiffness and air resistance; determined optimal cord parameters (MEEN 363).

title: Marbles Maze
summary: Modular marble maze game for elderly; won Best Prototype Award among 18 teams at MEEN 210 Project Showcase.

title: Connections AI
summary: ML algorithm using word vectorization to play the NYT Connections game; built at TAMU Datathon 2024.
